text: Martin Smolenski (Bulgarian: Мартин Смоленски; born 8 March 2003) is a Bulgarian footballer who plays as a midfielder for CSKA Sofia. ==Career== Smolenski joined CSKA Sofia as an 7-year-old and progressed through the club's academy system. He made his senior debut on 9 March 2019, a day after his 16th birthday, in a 3–1 league win over Etar at Ivaylo Stadium, replacing Jorginho for the final 2 minutes. ==Career statistics== ===Club=== As of 15 September 2020 {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |- !rowspan="2"|Club !rowspan="2"|Season !rowspan="2"|Division !colspan="2"|League !colspan="2"|Cup !colspan="2"|Europe !colspan="2"|Total |- !width="15"| Apps !width="15"| Goals !width="15"| Apps !width="15"| Goals !width="15"| Apps !width="15"| Goals !width="15"| Apps !width="15"| Goals |- |rowspan="3" align=center valign=center|CSKA Sofia |rowspan=2|First League |2018–19 |3||0||0||0||0||0||3||0 |- |2020–21 |1||0||0||0||0||0||1||0 |- !colspan="2"|Total !3!!0!!0!!0!!0!!0!!3!!0 |- |align=center valign=center|Litex Lovech (loan) |rowspan=1|Second League |2019–20 |1||0||0||0||colspan="2"|–||1||0 |- ! colspan=3 | Career Total !5!!0!!0!!0!!0!!0!!5!!0 |} ==References== ==External links== * Category:2003 births Category:Living people Category:Bulgarian footballers Category:Association football midfielders Category:PFC CSKA Sofia players Category:PFC Litex Lovech players Category:First Professional Football League (Bulgaria) players Category:Sportspeople from Sofia
